text: Where allowed by applicable law there may be an administrative charge for supply of copies of data and we may also require you to provide us with appropriate identification before we comply with this request.

Privacy Policy

3. How we collect personal data

We collect information about you:

data_type: personal data you give to we
text: Whenever you input personal data into our website (for example, subscribing to our emails or requesting a demo), we will collect the personal data that you give to us.
We will maintain records of your personal data for as long as you remain:
For example, Breeio collects your Zoom account data only if and when you authorize the Breeio Zoom app.
